title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks                    Bleeding Kansas Traveling Trunk Conflict in Kansas Territory           Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Fort Scott National Historic Site Bleeding Kansas Traveling Trunk    The Bleeding Kansas trunk includes a variety of materials that can be used to supplement education programs about this crucial era of Kansas History. Materials enclosed in the trunk include plays, media, historic images, and interactive activities.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Fifth Grade-Eighth Grade Subjects:African American History and Culture, Civil War, History, Slavery Keywords:Bleeding Kansas, traveling trunk, Slavery, 19th century
